name: you-tell-us-what-are-your-valentines-plans
title: You Tell Us: What Are Your Valentines Plans?
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: Consider this your official reminder that Valentine’s Day is this Saturday. What are your plans? Any tips on restaurants that are great for Valentine’s dinners around town (or better yet, places where we can still get a reservation)? It seems like there’s nothing quite as awesome as that one time Sigur Rós played the Ryman on Valentines Day, but is there anything fun we should know about? And if you’ll be spending the evening getting your drink on, well, let […]
contentEncoded:
Consider this your official reminder that Valentine’s Day is this Saturday. What are your plans? Any tips on restaurants that are great for Valentine’s dinners around town (or better yet, places where we can still get a reservation)? It seems like there’s nothing quite as awesome as that one time Sigur Rós played the Ryman on Valentines Day, but is there anything fun we should know about? And if you’ll be spending the evening getting your drink on, well, let us know that too.

Photo by aussiegall.
